title: Game developer - Freelance
description:
I used to develop games with Unity (C#), from simple simulation to complex 2D strategies (some samples are availible on my GitHub).
During that time I've learnt a lot about OOP, C#, algorithms and data structures.

title: .Net Developer - Elettric80
description:
I'd mainly developed WPF MVVM applications and connected it to the SQL Server database using EntityFramework and DataBase First approach.
Most of the project is developed in group, where I shown good soft and lidership skills.
Our team had used SCRUM methodology during project development.
Also I'd setuped tools for monitoring, collecting, and visualisation system data using Grafana and Prometheus.

title: .Net Developer - Sente
description: My main responsobility is the developing of ERP systems. This is tightly connected with Client-Server architecture, so C# and JavaScript are my main tools. Also part of these systems uses VCL technology, so sometimes I analise and write C++/Delphi code. Of corse databases are widely used as well, mainly Firebird, less often MSSQL. We have a large team, so Git, Jira and communication skills are strictly required.
